title: Transplanting Tomatoes & Peppers and a Look at the Growing Area

tasks.task: Transplanting tomato and pepper plants from seedlings.
subtasks: Labeling plants with variety names and transplant dates.
Preparing cups with drainage holes by cutting slits in the bottom.
Compacting potting mix into cups and creating a divot for planting.
Using a spoon to carefully dig seedlings from cups without damaging根系.
Separating individuals from overcrowded seedlings to reduce competition.
Disposing of diseased or weak seedlings to prevent spreading pathogens.
Planting seedlings in new cups with proper depth and support.
Applying fertilizer and watering plants after transplanting.

tasks.task: Setting up plants under grow lights.
subtasks: Arranging plants on a grow shelf or stand.
Positioning LED lights above plants for optimal photosynthesis.
Monitoring plant growth under new lighting conditions.
Identifying causes of weak plant growth, such as insufficient lighting or poor root development.
Discussing strategies to improve plant health and growth rates.
Preparing to implement a more effective fertilization routine in future videos.
